data.description: Fundamental elements of curriculum development, instruction, and assessment for teaching world languages in PK-12 contexts.
data.title: TEACHING WORLD LANGUAGES I

data.description: Provides in-depth examination of the issues associated with elements of teaching world languages in PK-12 contexts. Focuses on classroom community and procedures as well as advanced elements of instructional design and assessment.
data.title: TEACHING WORLD LANGUAGES II
